title: Notification Settings
custom_preconds: User must be using a Google Play Store device with an active Google Play Store account and an up to date Google Play Services

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Notification Settings Screen during Onboarding
and adds a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see:
- Global notification toggled ON
- MLB News notification toggled ON
- Favorite team's Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, and News notifications toggled ON

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Notification Settings Screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see:
- A Global Notification ON/OFF Toggle
- MLB News Notification Toggle
- Notification Toggles for each team alert type

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user toggles the global notification toggle on
And when the user signs up for at least one notification type for a given team 
And the user leaves the notification screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be subscribed to the notification channel
And the user should begin receiving notifications for the selected channel

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user toggles the global notification toggle OFF
And the user leaves the notification settings screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should not receive notifications for any subscribed channel.

(Verify with second subscribed device that notification is sent successfully.)

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify all notification types for each team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Notification options for each team should be:

Game Start
Game End
Scoring Plays
Lead Change
Pitching Change
Condensed Game
Video Highlight
Team News

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user makes changes to their notification settings
And the user loses connection (can force airplane mode)
And the user leaves the notification settings screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a notification informing them that their notification settings could not be saved.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user regains connection after leaving the notification screen
And taps the notification in the notification tray
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a notification informing them that their notification settings have been saved
And when the user returns to the notification screen they should see their changes appear as they have saved them. 
And when the user receives a notification that they recently signed up for and saved via the notification, they should receive the notification. (Verifying that their changes were actually sent to the service by tapping the notification.)

title: MLB News
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to "MLB News" notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: Send MLB News Notification of a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps MLB News Notification of a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the URL that was sent with the MLB News Notification

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Send MLB News Notification of a video highlight
(usually begins with the word "Video")
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps MLB News Notification of a video highlight
custom_steps_separated.expected:
At Bat should open and the video highlight that was sent with the MLB News Notification should launch

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

title: Game Start
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Game Start notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Game Start Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a 'Game Start'  notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Game Start Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the Gameday view for the appropriate game

title: Game End
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Game End notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Game End Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a 'Game End' notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Game End Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the Gameday view for the appropriate game

title: Scoring Plays
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Scoring Play notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Scoring Play Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a 'Scoring Play' notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Scoring Play Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the Gameday view for the appropriate game

title: Lead Change
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Lead Change notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Lead Change Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a 'Lead Change' notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Lead Change Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the Gameday view for the appropriate game

title: Pitching Change
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Pitching Change notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Pitching Change Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should receive a 'Pitching Change' notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Pitching Change notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the Gameday view for the appropriate game

title: Condensed Game
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
and is subscribed to a team's Condensed Game notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Condensed Game notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a video highlight notification
And the highlight should have "CG:" in the notification title

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps on the Condensed Game notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Video Highlight should begin to play
And when the highlight is done the user should be left on At Bat's default screen (Generally Team page or Scoreboard)

title: Video Highlights
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and they are subscribed to a team's In-Game Video Highlights notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Video Highlight notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a video highlight notification
And the highlight should have "Video:" in the notification title

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps on the Video highlight notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Video Highlight should begin to play
And when the highlight is done the user should be left on At Bat's default screen (Generally Team page or Scoreboard)

title: Team News
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's news notification

custom_steps_separated.content: Send Team News Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps Team News Notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the URL that was sent with the Team News Notification

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

title: Spanish
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the device language is set to Spanish
and the user subscribes to At Bat push notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be able to sign up for and receive notifications on the device
And the user should receive Spanish language notifications

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is signed up for English notifications
And the user changes their device to Spanish language
And the user opens At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's notification subscriptions should be changed from English to Spanish
And vice versa

title: Notification Tray
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to push notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user expands a notification from the notification tray
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the notification should expand
and the user should be able to read the notification text in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user swipes away an individual notification
Or clears all notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Notification should disappear
And the Notifications should NOT be 'ongoing' notifications

title: Quick hits navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND clicks on teams, standings, stats and starting lineups
THEN user should be redirected to the correct page
AND when user clicks on back button it should be redirected back to browse menu

NOTE: AUDIO do not redirect back to browse menu, it redirects back to home page. This has been already issued and accepted as it is.

title: Shop & tickets navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in shop, tickets and action
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: Ranking and advanced stats navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in prospect ranking, baseball savant
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: Listen & watch navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in watch MLB network and podcasts
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: More Apps from MLB navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in ballpark app, MLB play app, first pitch app, homerun derby app
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding application

title: Your account navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in account settings
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: Help navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in FAQS, Restore account, subscription management, contact us
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: About navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in browse menu page
AND user clicks in blackout restriction, privacy policy, terms of use, do not sell my personal data
THEN user should be redirected to the corresponding page

title: Watch View
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View (This is the screen that presents after clicking the TV icon in the app)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am first enter the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will see a Watch Now Tab that includes a single large hero item
AND I will see scrollable carousel with content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click the Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see a list of games on today's date or on the configured suggested date if no games are available on today's date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click the Search Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see the Film Room webview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am on the Watch View
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all text and navigation should be accessible in accessibility mode

title: SVOD/VOD Playback on Mobile
custom_preconds: Set device display timeout to a low time

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user with SVOD ability (entitlement)
WHEN I select a select a "Featured" video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the SVOD media content should stream
AND the playback controls will display and dismiss after a few seconds
AND the device will not timeout 
AND the screen will not turn off while the video is playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user without SVOD ability (entitlement)
WHEN I select a select a "Featured" video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the currently configured paywall will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a User
WHEN I select a select a "Highlights" video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the VOD media content should stream
AND the playback controls will display and dismiss after a few seconds
AND the device will not timeout 
AND the screen will not turn off while the video is playing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen is rotated 90 degrees and then back
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will toggle between landscape and portrait mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback controls will display and dismiss after a few seconds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I view the scrubber bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN it shows, in seconds, the time elapsed on the left
AND the scrubber position reflects the current position in the video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I drag or tap the scrubber bar to the left of the current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will go back to the position selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I drag or tap the scrubber bar to the right of the current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will advance to the position selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the +10 control
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback will advance forward 10 seconds in time until the end point is reached

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the -10 control
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback will move back 10 seconds in time until the beginning is reached

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN pause is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN play is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will resume

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the device screen is turned off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the strikethrough CC button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions will turn on and the regular CC button will display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the regular CC button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions will turn on and the strikethrough CC button will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the PIP button is tapped
AND then the full screen button is tapped from PIP
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss
AND the PIP window will display
AND then the full view screen view will display

title: VOD- preroll ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch View- Watch Now Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the use is un-entitled
AND the user selects a VOD clip (these are the clips that do not require entitlements (example: Most Popular carousel)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a preroll ad will play
AND the video will play after the preroll ad is complete

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the use is entitled
AND the user selects a VOD clip
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will play without preroll ad

title: Watch Now Tab - Callsigns
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am any user 
WHEN on the Watch tab 
AND there are games in the Hero and/or Game carousel
THEN I should see the broadcast Callsigns presented amongst the game information on the hero as well as for each game chip in the games carousel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to "Watch" tab on app and looks at game in the hero and games carousel on Watch Now
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN correct television callsigns (included those not carried on app) are presented underneath the game information for game in hero and games carousel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user observes TV Callsigns on hero and game chips within games carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all Callsigns on chip are listed out on a single line with each separated by commas

custom_steps_separated.content: IF Callsigns reach character limit on hero or game chip
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ellipsis (…) should appear at spot of overflow

custom_steps_separated.content: IF a game is not being broadcasts and thus has no callsigns
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no Callsigns should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user turns on Hide Spoilers/Scores
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Callsign information for games within games carousel should migrate from game information section to team logo area within the game chip

custom_steps_separated.content: IF user toggles Hide Scores/Spoilers mode on and off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN correct logic should be applied for location of Callsign on game chip

title: Watch Now Tab - Highlight Playback - CC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects an VOD/SVOD content from the carousels
AND the content is playing
AND the controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a CC icon should be available to select

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an VOD/SVOD content is playing
AND the CC icon is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will start showing closed captions IF they are available (sometimes they are not)

title: Games Tab - Callsigns
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am any user 
AND I am on the Games tab in the "Watch" View
AND there are games on the given date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I observe the game tiles
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the broadcast Callsigns (included those not carried on app) presented underneath the game information for each game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user observes TV Callsigns on game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all Callsigns on each game tile are listed out on a single line with each separated by commas

custom_steps_separated.content:
IF Callsigns reach character limit on game tiles
MARK THIS STEP AS BLOCKED IF THIS SITUATION IS NOT READILY PRESENT
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ellipsis (…) should appear at spot of overflow

custom_steps_separated.content:
IF a game is not being broadcasts and thus has no callsigns
TRY NAVIGATING TO SPRING TRAINING (example Feb 24, 2024) TO FIND GAMES WITH NO BROADCASTS
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no Callsigns should be displayed on the game tile

title: Back navigation from player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User on the Watch View

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a selection is streamed from the Watch Now tab
AND the back button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to the Watch now tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a selection is streamed from the Watch Now tab
AND the stream is played to completion
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will close and the app will return to the Watch Now tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is streamed from the Games tab
AND the the back button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to the Games tab

title: VOD/SVOD content  Playback - PIP
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an MLB Video VOD/SVOD is playing
AND the controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a PIP icon should be available to select

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an MLB Video Highlight/SVOD is playing
AND the PIP icon is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will minimize into a PIP window and continue playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an MLB Video Highlight/SVOD is playing in PIP
AND the video ends
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PiP window will close

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds: GIVEN hide scores is ON
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Watch page
custom_expected:
THEN the scores are replaced by rounded rects
AND all completed games say only “Final” (no inning info)
AND perfect game/no hitter badges are hidden
AND game status is hidden for live games
AND tv callsigns are moved inside the logo area on the game chip from their usual location

title: SLIVE feeds on Watch Now Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an SLIVE (subscription required, live feeds (not a normal game feed)) feed is in progress
AND they are offered on the Watch Now Tab in the Watch View
(If no SLIVE feed is available Mark this test case as blocked) NOTE: Live games in the Affiliated carousel & Big Inning are examples of SLive feeds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user without the SUBSCIBERVOD entitlement taps on an SLIVE offering
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then currently configure video paywall will display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user with the SUBSCIBERVOD entitlement taps on an SLIVE offering
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the SLIVE offering will begin streaming
AND the playback controls will display for a few seconds and dismiss

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen is rotated 90 degrees and then back
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will toggle between landscape and portrait mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the playback controls will display and dismiss after a few seconds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I view the scrubber bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it shows a variable live window of content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I attempt to drag the scrubber bar to the left or right
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN scrubbing is possible

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN pause is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN play is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will resume from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the device screen is turned off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will pause

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN LIVE is tapped
AND the video is paused
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video will resume from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN LIVE is tapped
AND the video is playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing will happen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the strikethrough CC button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions will turn on and the regular CC button will display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the regular CC button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions will turn on and the strikethrough CC button will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the PIP button is tapped
AND then the full screen button is tapped from PIP
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss 
AND the PIP window will display
AND then the full view screen view will display

title: Lock Icons on SVOD (subscriber restricted) content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab
NOTE: CLEAR APP DATA BETWEEN TESTING DIFFERENT USERS AS ENTITLEMENTS WILL BE CACHED FROM A PREVIOUS LOGIN. CLEARING APP CACHE IS INSUFFICIENT. APP DATA MUST BE CLEARED IN BETWEEN ANY CHANGE TO A NEW USER.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is entitled to SVOD content
AND the user observes SVOD content in a carousel (MilB Affiliate carousel and Featured carousel are examples of fairly consistently available SVOD content)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN lock icons will NOT be display on carousel tiles
NOTE: There is a known issue that the lock icons still display when the user has seen the lock icons and then logs in as entitled. This will be addressed in upcoming work, but is expected for now. Delete this note once this has been addressed.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is logged in
AND the user is un-entitled to SVOD content (free logged in user)
AND the user observes SVOD content in a carousel (MilB Affiliate carousel and Featured carousel are examples of fairly consistently available SVOD content)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN lock icons  will be display on carousel tiles

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is logged out
AND the user observes SVOD content in a carousel (MilB Affiliate carousel and Featured carousel are examples of fairly consistently available SVOD content)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN lock icons  will be display on carousel tiles

title: Pull to refresh
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Watch Now Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user executes a pull down from the top of the screen
custom_expected:
THEN the Watch Now Tab resets

NOTES: This can be exemplified by turning off the wifi/cell data signal when the page first tries to load and then turning wifi/cell data on and pulling down to refresh (The page would be blank on first attempt and then populate on the second attempt after a signal is available). Currently, Hide Scores will not update with a pull down if the user changes Hide Scores in settings (app restart is required to update). This is a known issue and is currently the expected behavior (Delete note on Hide Scores after this is addressed in the app)

title: Orientation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on any vod/svod 
AND user viewing a (s)vod in landscape mode
AND user hits the device back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the main watch tab screen should show in portrait mode and the content should fill the whole screen.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on any vod/svod 
AND user viewing a (s)vod in portrait mode
AND user hits the device back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the main watch tab screen should show in portrait mode and the content should fill the whole screen.

title: Share functionality to the native VOD media player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab
custom_expected:
Video on demand (VOD) videos should be sharable from the following areas of the app:

- Home Tab

- Scores

- Watch

- News

- Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the free/non-entitled content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the share option is available
AND user is able to share the content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens any content that requires subscription access
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN share option is not presented

title: Pre/Postgame Indicators
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game is in pre-game state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile shows the start time of the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Pre-game show has started (start times provided by club)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile shows a “Live” indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN both clubs have a pre-game show
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN copy “Pregame Show” should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN only one club has a pre-game show
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Pregame” is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Game is live (game start time has passed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the red “Live” indicator is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is Final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile continues to show a “Live” indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN both clubs have a post-game show
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN copy “Postgame Show” is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN only one club has a post-game show
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Postgame” is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game tile has a “Perfect Game” tag
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the tag is hidden while showing the Postgame label due to lack of space
AND the “Perfect Game” tag should be shown again after the Postgame is over

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the post-game show is over (Media=off)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile shows “Final” or Final/inning

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN neither club has a pre/post show
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN game tiles follow existing rules and only show start time>Live>Final

title: VOD/SVOD resume behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN starting non-live VOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN start from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN resuming VOD content from the app being backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content should resume from the point the user was previously watching from

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN resume any time of VOD content that the user previously watched
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN resume from where they were watching

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  a user finishes any type of VOD within 10s of the end of the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next time they play the video, it should start at the beginning

title: Games Tab - Date picker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User on the Games Tab of the Featured Page
custom_steps: WHEN I select the date
custom_expected: THEN I will be presented with a date picker

title: Games Tab View
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the MLB App
custom_steps: WHEN I select the Games tab on the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN I will see the scoreboard Compact View based on the date displayed in the date picker

title: Games Tab - w/ MLB.tv Subscription
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with MLB.tv ability
custom_steps: WHEN I select a game in the compact view
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB.tv game view will launch
AND the game will start playing according to the default launch rules

title: Games Tab without MLB.tv Subscription
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user without MLB.tv ability
custom_steps: WHEN I select a game in the compact view
custom_expected: THEN the user will be presented with the MLB.TV paywall

title: PIP window
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user watching a MLBTV game in PIP
AND the end of the playback is reached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PIP window closes

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the PIP window closed automatically
AND the user opens the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app launches to the screen that the user launched playback from

title: PiP for un-entitled user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab
AND user is unentitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN user watches a VOD clip in PiP mode
AND moved the PiP screen around on the phone to various locations
custom_expected: THEN the video is maintained regardless of the PiP location

title: PiP for entitled user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab
AND user is entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN user watches a VOD clip in PiP mode
AND moved the PiP screen around on the phone to various locations
custom_expected: THEN the video is maintained regardless of the PiP location

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Standings page with no favorite team selected
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two League tables: American League and National League
and the default division order: East, Central, West

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the AL East
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
American: AL East, AL Central, AL West
National: NL East, NL Central, NL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the AL Central
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
American: AL Central, AL East, AL West
National: NL East, NL Central, NL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the AL West
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
American: AL West, AL East, AL Central
National: NL East, NL Central, NL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the NL East
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
National: NL East, NL Central, NL West
American: AL East, AL Central, AL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the NL Central
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
National: NL Central, NL East, NL West
American: AL East, AL Central, AL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page 
and the favorite team selected is in the NL West
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see two divisional league table
National: NL West, NL East, NL Central
American: AL East, AL Central, AL West
And the user's favorite team(s) is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Standings Page with 1 or more favorite teams sset
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then each favorite team row should be bold with a light background highlight

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Standings Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the page is viewable in Portrait or Landscape mode

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on Standings and views the default headers
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then W, L, PCT, GB, L10, STRK are displayed as default categories 
and RDIFF is displayed (on wider phones & tablet)
and Next/Last game (on tablet landscape)
and Home/Away/.500 splits (on wider phone and tablet)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user navigates to a year prior to 1901 (1900 and back)

http://m.mlb.com/standings/?yyyy=1900&view=divisional
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see only National League

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user navigates to a year prior to 1994 (1993 to 1901)

http://m.mlb.com/standings/?yyyy=1993&view=divisional
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then then user should see National League and American League
and see NL East, NL West, AL East, and AL West

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user initially enters the Standings page
and no standings data loaded
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a spinner over a blank page until the data loads

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user initially enters the Standings page
and if there is standings data loaded

Use Cases: If I come from the background or another app directly to Standings OR Open from lock screen directly into standings OR Change segment control OR Change from main tab bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the last available data 
and immediately requests new data
and see a spinner of a 50% white transparency mask

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user sits on the standings page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the page will refresh automatically

Configurable refresh time
Default 5 minutes
Pull to refresh restarts clock
Do not blank out standings on refresh

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page
and pulls to refresh
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see latest data from the server and restart auto refresh cycle

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user arrives on the Standings page on the current year
custom_steps_separated.expected: We can see when the page was last updated

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page
and views the last updated data
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the text: 'Standings current as of Dec. 16, 2016 10:59 AM ET'
and will show in User local time (ET, CT, MST, MT, PT, outside the US)
and will show above clinch key

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings page
and changes to a past year
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see the last updated date and time.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings view
and no team has clinched a playoff spot
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we should not see any clinch text
and we should not see any clinch indicators
and we should not see any clinch key

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Standings view
and a team has clinched any postseason spot 

w - wild card
x - playoff berth
y - division leader
z - division and best record in the league
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see the clinch indicator after the name (BAL - x)
and clinch key at the bottom

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user changes to a previous season
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the clinch indicators and clinch key for the postseason teams from that year

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user changes to a previous season prior to Wild Card (1993 and back)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will not see the clinch indicator for wild card (w - wild card)
and w - wild card will not be in the clinch key

custom_steps_separated.content: When the editorial clinch text is blank
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the editorial clinch text is not displayed on Divisional Standings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the editorial clinch text is populated
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the editorial clinch text is displayed on Divisional Standings

Support HTML Tags (Bold and Break)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the configurable override is set to hide the Clinch text, use file:
https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/android/[version number]/lite-phone/extras.xml
i.e. https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/android/6.5.0/lite-phone/extras.xml

showClinchDescription="false"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the clinch text will not be displayed on Divisional Standings

title: Wildcard Standings
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is on Standings

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the Wild Card Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see American and National League tables
and top section of each table will show the correct division leaders (East, Central, West)
and divisional division label next to the name (E, C, W)

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the Wild Card Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see American and National League tables
and second section of each table will show the rest of the division ordered by Wild Card Games Behind (WCGB)

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the Wild Card teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a separator below the top two (2) Wild Card leaders

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the Wild Card Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then see the Wild Card informative text

"The top two Wild Card teams from each league make the postseason and play each other in a one-game playoff."

custom_steps_separated.content: when a user is on Standings and views the default headers
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then W, L, PCT, WCGB, L10, STRK are displayed as default categories 
and RDIFF is displayed (on wider phones and tablet)
and Next/Last game (on tablet)
and Home/Away/.500 splits (on wider phones and tablet)

title: Spring Standings
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is on Standings view

custom_steps_separated.content:
and views the Spring Training Standings

Teams: http://mlb.mlb.com/springtraining/
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see Cactus and Grapefruit League tables

Cactus League in AZ
Grapefruit League in FL

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the Spring Training Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the standings ordered descending by W and PCT

custom_steps_separated.content: and changes to a previous season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will not see previous season Spring Training Standings 
and it is only available for the current year

custom_steps_separated.content: and when the Spring Training year has tie game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see the tie game at the bottom
and the informative text

"Tie games do not count towards standings calculations."

title: Postseason Picture
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on Standings Page from (tab bar or More Menu)
or from the Standings link from Team Page

custom_steps_separated.content: and Postseason Picture URL is configured with a URL
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the webview loads
and the user is able to view the page

custom_steps_separated.content: and Postseason Picture header text is configured
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see header text that is in the config

custom_steps_separated.content:
and is on the Divisional or Wild Card Standings
and goes back to a previous season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will not see Postseason Picture
and it is only available for the current year

title: Ads
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a lite user is on the Standings view

custom_steps_separated.content: and scrolls through the Standings view
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user should see an Advertisement between the two league standings tables

custom_steps_separated.content: on handset portrait
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user will see 320x50 DFP Ad

custom_steps_separated.content: on handset landscape
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user will not see an ad

custom_steps_separated.content: on tablet portrait
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user will see 728x90 DFP ad

custom_steps_separated.content: on tablet landscape
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user will not see an ad

title: Table Headers
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is in At Bat
and taps on the main Standings view

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the American League header
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user should see red horizontal header
and American League text
and American League logo

custom_steps_separated.content: and views the National League header
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user should see blue horizontal header
and National League text
and National League logo

custom_steps_separated.content: and scrolls down the Standings view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the appropriate headers will stick while the data is swiped 

Example: see East header when swipe AL East teams and Central header will push East header off

title: Responsive Columns
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is on Standings
custom_expected: Then the user will get more standings data when have more screen space

title: Teams Information
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is on the Standings view

custom_steps_separated.content: on handset portrait
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see the team tricode (BOS, CLE, HOU)

custom_steps_separated.content: on handset landscape
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see the team logo and team tricode (BOS, CLE, HOU)

custom_steps_separated.content: on tablet
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see the team logo and team tricode (BOS, CLE, HOU)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to a previous season on any device
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will not see any team logo, and will only see the team tricode

title: Last & Next Game Columns (Tablet Landscape)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is using a Tablet in landscape mode 
AND the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is in At Bat
and sees the Last Game and Next Game column

custom_steps_separated.content: and sees the Last Game column
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see:
@ if the team was away or vs. if the team was home
and opponent's tricode (CLE, SEA, MIL)
and outcome (W or L)
and score (8-1, 10-1)

examples: @ CLE, W 8-1 or vs. SEA, 9-1

custom_steps_separated.content: and sees the Next Game column (in Preview)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see:
MM/DD (08/08)
and @ if the team was away or vs. if the team was home
and opponent's tricode (CLE, SEA, MIL)

examples: 08/08, @ TOR or 08/08, vs. NYY

custom_steps_separated.content: and taps Next Game or Last Game on the link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then Gameday view of the game should open

(Preview, Live, Wrap)

custom_steps_separated.content: and changes the date to a previous year
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the Last Game and Next Game columns are hidden

title: Timeout Message
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to Standings with low connectivity
(can test by throttling via Charles - try adjusting "Round-trip Latency" to 60000)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see an alert dialog that says, "Low Connectivity: using last available data" after a timeout of 30 seconds
and until the user presses okay, the loading spinner will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user presses 'okay' in the alert dialog
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the last available data will be shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the last available data is shown
and there are no user interactions while on the page
(e.g. when the autoload feature tries to update in the background)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the last available data will continue to be shown
(and the alert will be suppressed if page is auto-refreshed)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the last available data is shown
and the user pulls to refresh
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the alert is re-enabled for the next call
and displayed in the event of a timeout

title: Show Full Standings
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Team Page
and taps on Standings
custom_expected: Then the user should see the full Standings page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Team Page
and taps on Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we can see the Divisional and Wild Card Standings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has a Favorite Team
and navigates to a Team Page of a Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the favorite team league table should be shown first
and current team division section should be shown first
and current team should be bold with a light background highlight

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has a Favorite Team
and navigates to a Team Page of another team (current team)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the current team league table should be shown first
and current team division section should be shown first
and current team should be bold with a light background highlight

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has a Favorite Team
and navigates to a Team Page of another team (current team)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then ignore other favorite teams when on a team standings page
